item.title: Fried Apples
item.description: These Fried Apples are a delightful blend of tart and sweet flavors, perfectly spiced to create a comforting dish that everyone will love. Whether served as a side or a dessert over ice cream, they are sure to become a favorite!
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
⏱️ Prep Time: 15 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 30 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 45 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 4

📊 Difficulty: Easy

🥘 Ingredients

  • 4 medium apples, peeled, cored, and sliced
  • 2 tablespoons butter
  • 1/4 cup brown sugar
  • 1 teaspoon cinnamon
  • 1/4 teaspoon nutmeg
  • 1 tablespoon lemon juice

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. In a large skillet, melt the butter over medium heat.
  2. Add the sliced apples and cook for about 5 minutes until they start to soften.
  3. Stir in the brown sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg, and lemon juice.
  4. Continue to cook for another 10-15 minutes until the apples are tender and caramelized.

📌 Pinterest Tags: #cat1761229818868 #easyrecipe #1hourmeals #recipe #cooking #foodie #homemade #delicious #medium #butter #brown

item.title: Sweet Pepper Sausage Pasta
item.description: Indulge in this cozy and colorful Sweet Pepper Sausage Pasta, a delightful weeknight meal that brings bold flavors to your table with minimal fuss. Perfectly cooked penne, smoky sausage, and tender bell peppers come together in a rich tomato sauce that will warm your heart and satisfy your cravings.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
⏱️ Prep Time: 15 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 30 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 45 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 4

📊 Difficulty: Easy

🥘 Ingredients

  • 12 ounces penne pasta
  • 1 pound smoked sausage, sliced
  • 2 bell peppers, sliced
  • 1 can (14.5 ounces) diced tomatoes
  • 2 tablespoons olive oil
  • 1 teaspoon Italian seasoning
  • Salt and pepper to taste
  • Grated Parmesan cheese for serving

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. Cook penne pasta according to package instructions until al dente. Drain and set aside.
  2. In a large skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add sliced sausage and cook until browned.
  3. Add sliced bell peppers and cook until tender, about 5 minutes.
  4. Stir in diced tomatoes and Italian seasoning. Simmer for 10 minutes.
  5. Add cooked penne to the skillet, tossing to combine. Season with salt and pepper.
  6. Serve hot, garnished with grated Parmesan cheese.

📌 Pinterest Tags: #cat1761229818868 #easyrecipe #1hourmeals #recipe #cooking #foodie #homemade #delicious #penne #pound #peppers
